text: "I'd Die to Be with You Tonight" is a 1985 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes. It is the leading single from his second studio album For the Working Class Man. It went to number 7 in Australia and number 16 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== 7" Single (K-9819) *Side A "I'd Die to Be with You Tonight" - 3:54 *Side B "Vision" - 3:08 12" /Maxi (X 14248) *Side A "I'd Die to Be with You Tonight" (Extended) *Side B1 "Resurrection Shuffle" *Side B2 "Vision" - 3:08 ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: I'd Die to Be with You Tonight
